scripts.build: parcel build project-root/index.html --dist-dir public --public-url ./ && cp project-root/coming-soon.html public/index.html && cp project-root/images/coming-soon-bg.jpg public/coming-soon-bg.jpg
scripts.enable-coming-soon: sh -c 'touch .coming_soon && git add .coming_soon && git commit -m "Enable Coming Soon" && git push origin main'
scripts.disable-coming-soon: sh -c 'git rm -f .coming_soon && git commit -m "Disable Coming Soon" && git push origin main'
scripts.preview: npm run build && python3 -m http.server --directory public 8000
